summary: Johnny Depp pays a visit to Ralph Steadman, the renown artist and the last of the original Gonzo visionaries who worked alongside Hunter S. Thompson.
cast: Ralph Steadman|Johnny Depp|Hunter S. Thompson|Terry Gilliam|Richard E. Grant|Jann Wenner|Hal Willner|Francis Bacon|William S. Burroughs|Patrick Godfrey|Warren Hinckle|Bill Murray|Richard Nixon|Laurence Olivier|Joe Petro|Pablo Picasso|Ron Whitehead
title: Retrato de Ralph Steadman
